verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus, priceless Treasure, source of purest pleasure, truest Friend to me; Long my heart hath panted till it well nigh fainted, thirsting after Thee. Thine I am, O spotless Lamb, I will suffer nought to hid Thee, ask for nought beside Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: In thine arms I rest me, foes who would oppress me cannot reach me here; though the earth be shaking, every heart be quaking, Jesus calms my fear; sin and hell in conflict fell with their heaviest storms assail me. Jesus will not fail me.

verse.name: v3
v4
v5
verse.lines: Farewell, thou who choosest earth, and heaven refuses, thou wilt tempt in vain; hence, ye sins, nor blind me, get ye far behind me, come not forth again: past your hour, O pomp and power; godless life, thy bonds I sever, leave thee now for ever!

verse.name: v6
